text: Static vs. Non-static Key differences between static and non-static (a.k.a. instance) methods: e Static methods are invoked using the class name, e.g. Dog.makeNoise(); e Instance methods are invoked using an instance name, e.g. maya.makeNoise(); e Static methods can’t access “my” instance variables, because there is no “me”.
